com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.utils.chcodeverifier

Interface CHCodeVerifierListener


  • public interface CHCodeVerifierListener
    A listener that may be called by the SDK depending on the supported CVM (e.g. Wallet PIN).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void maxRetryReached()
      A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification maximum retry reached.
      void onVerificationError(int retriesCount, SDKError<CHCodeVerifierErrorCode> error)
      A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification fails with the number of remaining retries.
      void onVerificationSuccess()
      A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification succeeded.

    • Method Detail

      • onVerificationError

        void onVerificationError(int retriesCount,
                         SDKError<CHCodeVerifierErrorCode> error)
        A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification fails with the number of remaining retries. This support depends on the support CVM (e.g. Wallet PIN).
        Parameters:
        retriesCount - - number of remaining retries. If returning 0, the SDK will wipe the card information from the wallet.
        error - SDK error object

      • onVerificationSuccess

        void onVerificationSuccess()
        A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification succeeded.

      • maxRetryReached

        void maxRetryReached()
        A callback to notify the MPA that CVM verification maximum retry reached. At this stage, all installed cards in MPA will be wiped for security purposes.
